entry.title: My First Post
entry.summary:
This is my first post. I will be putting in more tutorials as we go. We will take a look at making static websites, adding content, and customizing them.

We will use pelican for our project, and host it on github.
entry.content:
This is my first post. I will be putting in more tutorials as we go. We will take a look at making static websites, adding content, and customizing them.

We will use pelican for our project, and host it on github.
